lines.text: She's the kinda girl that will call you on your bullshit. She isn't afraid to dance and she offers to pay. She doesn't decide before a date whether or not she's gonna kiss you; she's not earnest, yet she's not completely ironic either... She orders dessert and she can be ready in ten minutes.
Who are we making jealous?
Everyone Nicole... everyone.
Prince charming is a dick, bring on the frogs.
Ribbit.
I was hoping I could ask to cut in.
Well Ray left, but it's okay with me... I bet you can still catch him if you hurry.
actually I wanted to dance with you.
What's wrong with wanting to be liked?
You want them to like you, Dave? Tell them to go fuck themselves. People like that need people like you, otherwise there's twice as much trawsh and no one to take it out.
You're totally losing me.
[Dave's pager goes off]
Don't go Dave. There's sober people there. They just don't want to leave the party.
I can't not go.
There are rules, you know.

[Brad is drunk]
"Rules"?
Rules!
What rules?
Seniors rule!
You don't send Designated Dave to ask if I'll go with you if you don't plan on following through with the offer.
I was going to. I-I-I was going to. It's-It's just that...

[mockingly]
He just - He-He-He just - He just - He-He...
Shut up!
I don't know. I - I fell in love.
Girl gets two-faced boy in back seat. Violence anticipated.
Are you stoned? You can tell me you know, I'd be cool.
Yeah I know you'd be cool.
What is that supposed to mean?
It means I've read your yearbook. "Onward through the fog. Light up and party, have sex be free. We're the class of '73."
Are you stoned?
Dad, until you come in here and you see a black light and a felt Led Zepplin poster, rest easy.
Its called an easy-out-clause because its supposed to be EASY
We used to be your friends, if you can remember that far back.
You know what I remember, Dave? I remember you cleaning out Eddie Lampell's locker because he said he'd be your friend.
I did the guy a favor!
I remember you buying Alicia Digressatio at the Student Council Auction last year, and then letting her spend the whole day with her boyfriend.
Do you have a point?
Yeah, my point is Dave, you're not mad at me. You're jealous.
Hey, I finally downloaded the original Space Invaders. I'm talking quality 1981 graphics here.
Why are we doing this?
As a protest.
Of what?
People, right?
Sheep.
Check, Dave. We're doing this to protest sheep.
And what specifically about sheep do we object to?
Chase?
General herding mentality.
We're moving in together.
[Nicole and Chase give one another a surprised look]
Obviously, we all need to think about what this means.
Sure, well... tell you what. Why don't you two think about it here, and we'll go think about it in the treehouse.
[Nicole is crossing out guys in her yearbook]
Moron. One eyebrow. Taking GEORGANNE WARNER. Failed health. Taking Sue. Taking Dee Vine.
[She scribbles a guy's face out]
Refers to himself as "The De-Virginator".
It's easy to be a bitch now that Brad Seldon's available.
It's easy to be a bitch either way.
You know, I still have the letter you wrote me in 7th grade.
Burn it.
You said, uh - You said you hated me, and there was sonething in there about how the only way you'd ever touch me again was if you came down with leprosy.
Sorry about that.
Don't be. I deserved it. I'm the one who should be sorry. Chase, when your mom got sick...
Please Nicole lets not do this.

I want to, I've wanted to say this for 5 years now. When your mom got sick, I couldn't bear to go over to your house it was too hard, I was too scared. I just wanted to cry all the time. Everytime I saw her, everytime I saw you. Even when we were together, you wouldn't say anything you would just sit there. So when you started wigging out in school, skipping, pulling fire alarms, I just acted like I didn't know you.
Well I'm over it now.
Well, good night.
Yeah.
Sorry, Dave. I would've driven him home, but I can't drive his car. It's a stick.
Well, I'll show you how to drive a stick right now. Here it is. Come on.
I meant a real car, Eddie, not a matchbox.
[Eddie is beating up Dave]
What are you thinking Designated Dave? Huh? This isn't Revenge of the Nerds, man! No radioactive spider bit you!
You think you're Miss Thing. But you know what? You're just a wanna-be who got lucky with a case of bulimia!
The key to pleasing a woman is sweet talk. You're so beautiful. Have you lost weight? And then there are the three words that always seal the deal for me...
Another tequila shot?
I didn't expect you to fall in love.
I didn't expect you to fall into the Gap!
I'm a walking punchline.
We're moving in together.
What?
Maybe we should think about this.
Okay, you think about it here and we'll think about it in the tree-house.
It's easy to be a bitch now that Brad Seldon is available.
It's easy to be a bitch either way.

[driving Chase home]
So who was at the party?
Everyone.

[slams on the brakes]
Everyone was not at the party! I wasn't there.
Agent Scully or Gillian Anderson?
They're the same person, you idiot.

[to Chase]
How about you?
Let's see, a flaky, self-absorbed actress or a gun-toting, badass FBI agent with years of pent-up sexual tension? No contest.
My man. What I wouldn't do to Scully...
I'm sure she's been drooled on before.
[Chase and Nicole are kissing]
Oh, hey Dulcie.
Get a room.
We're breaking up, aren't we?
I just think we're headed in different directions, that's all.
Your parents named you Dee Vine?
No Dee's a contraction. I changed it myself.
Hey Kathy. Have you been over to Brad's?
Yeah, it's nice.
Weird huh? His family seems so normal. You'd never guess they belonged to one of those doomsday cults.
A - Are you serious?
I'm staying
Why?
I like to party. I like to get down.
Why are you telling me this? I'm your past tense quasi-boyfriend, not the American people.
Well, what I'm trying to say, is that both the tense and title are negotiable.
Nicole, I'm honestly sorry about how things worked out. I really thought Brad was gonna ask you.
He did. But I already had a date. He was bummed, so I let him know you were easy.
You think you're so James Dean, Chase!
Introducing Miss Time Zone herself, Miss Judy Vine, escorted by
[pauses in disbelief]
Dave Ednasi?
